description:
cmd/go: don't add detail to errPrintedOutput

This makes the last error-reporting CL a bit less
aggressive.  errPrintedOutput is a sentinel value
that should not be wrapped.

messages.text:
Hello gri (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

In the CL desc shouldn't it be s/wrapped/printed/ ?

On Fri, Mar 16, 2012 at 15:53,  <gri@golang.org> wrote:
> In the CL desc shouldn't it be s/wrapped/printed/ ?

It shouldn't be printed either, but I meant wrapped
like adding more context as in the fmt.Errorf.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=81b5bb873a0c ***

cmd/go: don't add detail to errPrintedOutput

This makes the last error-reporting CL a bit less
aggressive.  errPrintedOutput is a sentinel value
that should not be wrapped.

R=gri
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5845052

subject: code review 5845052: cmd/go: don't add detail to errPrintedOutput
